title: Configure Google Maps API key for Admin Live Tracking map

requirements.summary: Configure VITE_GOOGLE_MAPS_API_KEY so Admin Dashboard > Live Tracking loads Google Maps via the existing dynamic loader and renders shipment markers with info windows.
acceptanceCriteria: When VITE_GOOGLE_MAPS_API_KEY is set to "AIzaSyC0ZPKa3tgNMATa8PwdUheyhIAH1E3Gi9o", the Admin Dashboard > Live Tracking view loads the Google Maps script using the callback=initMap parameter (via the existing dynamic loader in AdminTrackingPanel).
If the API key is not set, the Live Tracking view shows the existing English warning message that the Google Maps API key is not configured (no blank/white map).
With at least one shipment that has coordinates, the map renders and shows a marker per shipment with coordinates, and clicking a marker opens an info window with shipment details.

file_operations.description: Add Vite environment configuration with VITE_GOOGLE_MAPS_API_KEY set to the exact value "AIzaSyC0ZPKa3tgNMATa8PwdUheyhIAH1E3Gi9o" so the existing AdminTrackingPanel dynamic loader can read it at build/runtime.

Harden the existing Google Maps dynamic loader to reliably load the script with callback=initMap (e.g., avoid duplicate script insertion across tab mounts, reset mapError appropriately when apiKey changes, and keep the current missing-key warning behavior and marker/info-window rendering logic intact).
